lead_paragraph: The sport’s world governing body suspended its ban on international matches at high altitude, allowing Bolivia to host coming World Cup qualifiers at La Paz. FIFA’s executive committee also backed the objectives of Joseph S. Blatter, the FIFA president, regarding his plan to force professional clubs to field at least six players who are eligible to play for the national team of that club’s country.
